## KeychainBackend class

macOS Keychain secret backend.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class KeychainBackend implements SecretBackend 
```
**Implements:** [SecretBackend](./vaultkeeper.secretbackend.md)

## Remarks

Only available on Darwin (macOS). Uses `security` CLI to store/retrieve generic passwords. Secrets are base64-encoded before storage.
